_json.title: Tressa Watercolors Color Depositing Shampoo in 'Liquid Copper'
_json.gridTitle: Tressa Watercolors Color Depositing Shampoo in 'Liquid Copper'
_json.description: As seen in many H2BAR Boxes, this is a 3-in-1, sulfate-free color depositing shampoo. It cleanses, conditions and refreshes color in one easy step. Specially formulated to deposit color and deliver vibrant tones and brilliant shine, while a rich foaming lather nourishes every hair strand. Enhance natural or 'by choice' hues with this ultimate color enhancing, conditioning shampoo. Free of sulphates, parabens, and gluten!
